annotations: The type strain is TG 5-3T (= ATCC 51228T=DSM 9165T=NCCB 92012), isolated from a near-shore sulfidic hydrothermal area in Matupy Harbour of New Britain Island, Papua New Guinea.
The type strain is 1502-91T (=CCUG 46148T=CIP 106119T=DSM 25327T=LMG 14382T), isolated from a Pekin duck in Germany.
The type strain is AT2T (=CSUR P2014T=DSM 100451T), isolated from the faeces of a healthy 28-year-old French male.

The type strain is B57T (=CGMCC1.19488T=KCTC 92053T) isolated from sediment collected in Clam Island, Liaoning Province. The GenBank accession numbers of the 16S rRNA gene sequence and draft genome sequence of strain B57T are MZ433255 and JAHVAI000000000, respectively. Strain WL0115 (=MCCC 1K07531=JCM 35568=GDMCC 1.3088), isolated from seawater of the Yellow Sea, China, is also affiliated to this species.
The type strain, DW2-9T (=CCTCC AB 2011145T=KCTC 15169T), was isolated from soil. The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession numbers are JN797511 (16S rRNA gene) and JFZB01000000 (genome), respectively.

The type strain, SgZ-3T (=KACC 16603T=CCTCC AB 2012026T), was isolated from an electrochemical biofilm. The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession numbers are JX113682 (16S rRNA gene) and SAVB01000000 (genome), respectively.

The type strain, BO-81T (=KACC 19677T=LMG 30808T), was isolated from sludge sampled in the Republic of Korea. The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession numbers are MN365231 (16S rRNA gene) and RCHI01000000 (genome), respectively.

The type strain, SK2B-1T (=CFCC 14580T=KCTC 52802T), was isolated from symptomatic bark tissue of Populus euramericana canker. The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession numbers are MH282460 (16S rRNA gene) and SAUV00000000 (genome), respectively.

The type strain, YIM 96095T (=KCTC 49266T=CGMCC 4.7636T), was isolated from a soil sample collected from Aiding Lake, Xinjiang province, north-west China. The DNA G+C content of the type strain is 69.7 mol%. The NCBI GenBank accession number for the 16S rRNA gene sequence of strain YIM 96095T is MK182318. The draft whole genome sequence for YIM 96095T has been deposited at DDBJ/ENA/GenBank under accession number GCA_003725585.1.
The WK012_4_13T (= LMG 33104T = DSM 116073T), designated as the type strain, was obtained from a water kefir sample. The G+C DNA content of this strain is 56%.
The WK041_4_12T (= LMG 33105T = DSM 116074T), designated as the type strain, was obtained from a water kefir sample. The G+C DNA content of this strain is 53.9%.
The type strains are PMTSA4T (=KCTC 102074T =CCTCC AB 2024023T), while PMR2A8 (KCTC 102073= CCTCC AB 2024024) is identified as a different strain of F. capsici.

The type strain, SS33T (=JCM 39184T =KCTC 25253T), was isolated from a deep-sea hydrothermal vent chimney in the Western Pacific Ocean. The 16S rRNA gene sequence and whole-genome sequence of strain SS33T have been deposited in the GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ databank under the accession numbers LC819326 and AP026369, respectively.

The type strain, EV16PT (= KCTC 8296T, = DSM 117028T), was isolated from E. variegatus reared at the University of Turin, Italy. The genome size is 2388582 bp, and the DNA G+C content is 57.0%. The NCBI accession number of the genome and the 16S rRNA gene sequence are JAWJZY000000000 and OR678267, respectively.

The type strain CBA3628T (=KACC 23049T = DSM 116836T) was isolated from kimchi collected at the World Institute of Kimchi, Gwangju, Republic of Korea. The DNA G+C content of the type strain was 37% (calculated from the whole genome sequence). The GenBank accession numbers for the 16S rRNA gene sequence and whole-genome sequence are PP069783 and CP0424047, respectively.
The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ/PIR accession numbers for the sequences of the D1/D2 domain of the LSU rRNA gene and the ITS region determined in this study are OP954744 and OP954743 for CICC 33584T.
The type strain is 2205BS29-5T (=LMG 33062T =KACC 23240T), which is isolated from a marine sponge, P. elegans, collected from Beomseom in Jeju-Island, Republic of Korea.
The DNA G+C content of strain 2205BS29-5T is 67.8%.
The type strain is NEAU-NG30T (=MCCC 1K08677T=JCM 35654T), isolated from soil collected from Harbin, Heilongjiang Province, China (45 8 N, 126 5 E).
The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession number for the 16S rRNA gene sequence of strain NEAU-NG30T is PP863884.

The type strain is HZT (NCIMB 15482T=ATCC TSH-398T) and was isolated from the parasitoid wasp, S. cameroni (Hymenoptera: Spalangiidae), collected in an egg-laying poultry facility in Hazon, Israel, in AprilMay 2014, where the wasps develop on pupae of the housefly, Musca domestica (Diptera: Muscidae).
The type strain, IA91T (=JCM 39387T=KCTC 25736T), was isolated from a slurry of sediments and formation water derived from a deep sedimentary, natural-gas-bearing saline aquifer in Japan
The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession numbers for the 16S rRNA gene sequence and genome sequences of strain IA91T are LC818858 and AP035449, respectively.
The type strain M09T (=GDMCC 1.4157T=KCTC 8143T) was isolated from the rhizosphere soil of kiwifruit trees in Fangshan, Beijing, PR China.
The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession number for the 16S rRNA gene sequence of strain M09T is OM920831 and that of the genome sequence is CP132956.
The type strain, A1S7T (=KCTC 49714T = JCM 36706T), was isolated from the gut of marine sandworm (A. virens).

The type strain BSw22131T (= CCTCC AB 2019135T = JCM 36635T = DSM 117336T) was isolated from seawater in Arctic Kongsfjorden of Ny-lesund, Svalbard. The DNA G+C content of the type strain was 58.2%. The NCBI GenBank accession number for the 16S rRNA gene sequence of strain BSw22131T is MF630609. The genome sequence of strain BSw22131T is CP113949.

The type strain DMSP-1T (= CCTCC AB 2019124T = JCM 36636T = DSM 117337T) was isolated from seawater in Arctic Kongsfjorden of Ny-lesund, Svalbard. The DNA G+C content of the type strain was 60.0%. The NCBI GenBank accession number for the 16S rRNA gene sequence of strain DMSP-1T is KU233521. The genome sequence of strain DMSP-1T is CP034425.

The type strain is RM8705T (=LMG 32300T = CCUG 75470T), recovered in 2009 from cow faeces in California. Accession numbers for the 16S rRNA gene and genome sequence of the type strain are MW157372 and CP019685, respectively.

The type strain YH-ols2223T (=KCTC 25800T = NBRC 116680T) was isolated from a pig faeces specimen on a pig farm. The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession number for the 16S rRNA gene sequence of YH-ols2223T is PP514387, and that for the genome sequence is JAZGJQ000000000.

Strain DGU6T (= KACC 23721T = TBRC 19016T) was isolated from the mudflat of S. japonica colonies in Incheon, Republic of Korea. The genomic DNA G+C content of the type strain is 64.5%. The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ/PIR accession numbers of the whole-genome shotgun sequences and 16S rRNA sequences are JBBYHV000000000 and PP504315, respectively.
The type strain is S88T (=KACC 23423T =JCM 36647T), isolated from a marine red alga L. hakodatensis.
The type strain is W115T =KACC 23690T =JCM 36651T), isolated from a marine red alga S. dubyi.
The GenBank accession numbers of the 16S rRNA gene and genome sequences of strain W115T are OR431747 and CP146606CP146607, respectively.
The type strain, IMAU50987T (= GDMCC 1.4189T = JCM 36315T), was isolated from black comb honey. The DNA G+C content of the type strain is 63.5%.

The type strain ZYX-F-249T (=CCTCC AA 2023030T =JCM 36778T) was isolated from the gill of the leopard coral grouper collected from Yongxing Island, Sansha, Hainan Province, China. The draft genome size of the type strain is 8.8 Mb, and genome sequencing shows a DNA G+C content of 71.6 %. The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession number for the 16S rRNA gene sequence of Microbispora maris ZYX-F-249T is PP078609. The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession number for the draft genome sequence of Microbispora maris ZYX-F-249T is JBDJAW000000000.

The type strain, HT6-4T (=KCTC 59234T =GDMCC 1.4386T), was isolated from soil from the Flaming Mountain, Xinjiang, PR China. The DNA G+C content of type strain is 73.9 mol%. The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession numbers for the genome and 16S rRNA gene sequences of strain HT6-4T are CP155551 and PP767292, respectively.
The type strain SCSIO 66989T (=MCCC 1K08014T=KCTC 92499T) was isolated from reef-building coral in Sanya, Hainan Province, China.
The type strain is SDUM158016T (=KCTC 92632T =MCCC 1H01367T), which was isolated from coastal sediments collected off the coast of Weihai, China.
The GenBank accession numbers for the 16S rRNA gene sequence and the whole-genome shotgun project of strain SDUM158016T are OP526358 and JAOPHT000000000, respectively.

The type strain is SDUM158017T (=KCTC 92633T =MCCC 1H01363T), which was isolated from a marine solar saltern along the Weihai coast, China. The GenBank accession numbers for the 16S rRNA gene sequence and the whole-genome shotgun project of strain SDUM158017T are OP522343 and JARRSA000000000, respectively.
Type strain SMYT11WT (=GDMCC 1.4275T=KCTC 8304T) was isolated from a river located in Southwest China.
Type strain FXH3WT (=GDMCC 1.4096T=KCTC 8154T) was isolated from a deep lake located in Southwest China.
The type strain is 1.1416T (=KCTC 62979T=CCTCC AB 2018348T).
The type strain is WF-2T (=KCTC 62441T=CGMCC 1.13633T).
The type strain is 50T (=KCTC 92088T=CCTCC AB 2022035T).
The type strain is YJ15T (=KACC 19552T=NBRC 113197T).
The type strain is DS-58T (=KCTC 12822T=DSM 17958T).
The type strain is HX-5-24T (=KCTC 72470T=CCTCC AB 2019228T).
The type strain is KVB24T (=KACC 19816T=JCM 32879T).
The type strain is A6T (=KCTC 82184T=CGMCC 1.18582T).
The type strain is CC-Bw-6T (=BCRC 80612T=JCM 19164T).
The type strain is UM1T (=KCTC 42936T=DSM 28473T).
The type strain is 83-4T (=NBRC 113451T=CGMCC 1.13464T).

The type strain is AM20-91T (=DSM 104734T=LMG 30011T).
The type strain is GH34-4T (=DSM 18244T=KACC 11587T).
The type strain is R19T (=JCM 34258T=KACC 21767T).
The type strain is II4T (=NBRC 113956T=KACC 21196T).
The type strain is RCML-52T (=DSM 25188T=KCTC 22558T).
The type strain is ZLD-29T (=DSM 26007T=KCTC 23077T).
The type strain is UKS-15T (=JCM 30983T=KACC 18719T).
The type strain is 17J68-2T (=JCM 33058T=KCTC 62237T).
The type strain is C8-1T (=CGMCC 1.16271T=KCTC 62034T).
The type strain is 17J7-1T (=JCM 33057T=KCTC 62217T).
The type strain is KMU-14T (=NBRC 110750T=KCTC 42381T).
The type strain is S2-CT (=JCM 31130T=KACC 18502T).
The type strain is SJ-36T (=CGMCC 1.16756T=KCTC 43039T).
The type strain is TLK-CK17T (=CCTCC AB 2021257T=KCTC 92122T).
The type strain is SG-8T (=GDMCC 1.1817T=KACC 21942T).
The type strain is 119BY6-57T (=LMG 30077T=KACC 19276T).
The type strain is GW1-59T (=CCTCC AB 2019390T=KCTC 72831T).
The type strain is ZS79T (=DSM 27222T=KCTC 23365T).
The type strain is H23M41T (=JCM 33223T=KCTC 62676T).
The type strain is H21R20T (=JCM 34832T=KCTC 82316T).
The type strain is IMMIB APB-9T (=CCUG 53152T=DSM 18482T).
The type strain is RS-LYSO-3T (=CICC 23922T=JCM 31042T).
The type strain is AS29MT (=CECT 30171T=LMG 32343T).
The type strain is 13AT (=GDMCC 1.2722T=JCM 34786T).
The type strain is KMM 329T (=DSM 21749T=JCM 14760T).
The type strain is Zs60T (=CGMCC 1.15509T=NBRC 112614T).
The type strain is GH1-9T (=DSM 17634T=KACC 11406T).
The type strain is CTN-1T (=DSM 22393T=CGMCC 1.10136T).

The type strain is AB1T (=CECT 9275T=LMG 32341T), isolated from a drinking water treatment plant in Barcelona (Spain). The GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession numbers for the 16S rRNA gene and genome sequences of the type strain are PQ072836 and CAJRAF01, respectively.
The type strain is AB67T (=CECT 9623T=LMG 32342T), isolated from a drinking water distribution network in Tona (Barcelona, Spain).

The type strain CCTCC AB 2023082T (=JCM 36393T) was isolated from the leaves of C. triplicata. The DNA G+C content of strain CCTCC AB 2023082T is 54.2 mol%. The GenBank accession number for the 16S rRNA gene sequence of strain CCTCC AB 2023082T is OR177835, while the genome can be accessed through the GenBank with the accession number CP151800.
The type strain is KLBMP 9567T (= CGMCC 4.7773T = NBRC 115787T), which was isolated from karstic areas of Guizhou Province, China.
The type strain, MH2T (=GDMCC 1.3750T=JCM 36318T), was isolated from C. annuum showing wilt disease symptoms collected from a farmland in Machong town, Guangdong, China.
The type strain, MH1T (=GDMCC 1.3749T=JCM 36317T), was isolated from C. annuum showing wilt disease symptoms collected from a farmland in Machong town, Guangdong, China.
